prompt: hi, i am writing an hackthon project, a multiagent system using google adk, right now i need a description for my front end which is a web app. there will be one section which is a chatbot one the left side of the page. i want to be able to talk to the app, and the audio will get converted to text, and send to my backend API, api will return the response to the front end, and front end will be able to speak to user and show the text. on the right side, there will be three component, weather, calendar, and email
name: App
